original: Boström, Erik Anders Emanuel, folkskollärare, Uddevalla, f. 3/4/85 i V. Ämtervik, Värml. 1., av folkskoll. Anders B. o. Elisabet Bauman-Göthe. G. 1. 13 m. Anna Björlin, d. 19; 2. 23 m. Anne-Maj Jansson. Barn: Maj f. 14, g. m. dr Bengt Åkerlund, Västerås, Ake 24, ing. v. L. M. Ericsson, Sthlm, Kerstin 31, ®tud. — Fofekoll:-ex. i Karlstad 11, ett flert. utb :kurser. Lär. v. Uddevalla folksk. Led. av stadsfullm. sed. 27, ordf. i hälsov :nd sed. 33 o. i tax:nd sed. 36, varit led. av beredn :utsk., ordf. i fattigv :styr. o. led. av skollovskolonistyr., ordf. i pens :nd sed. 46, fd. led. av styr. f. Uddevalla arb :kommun, ordf. i Uddevallatraktens lär: kl.
translated: Boström, Erik Anders Emanuel, elementary school teacher, from Uddevalla, born on March 4th, 1885 in Västra Ämtervik, Värmland. Son of elementary school teacher Anders B. and Elisabet Bauman-Göthe. Was first married for 13 months to Anna Björlin who passed away in 1919. Then married Anne-Maj Jansson for 23 months. Children: Maj b. 1914, married to Dr. Bengt Åkerlund from Västerås, Åke b. 1924, works as an engineer at L.M. Ericsson in Stockholm, Kerstin b. 1931, student. Passed the elementary school teacher exam in Karlstad in 1911 and took several educational courses. Worked at Uddevalla elementary school. Member of the city council since 1927. Was chairman of the health committee from 1933 and of the tax committee from 1936. Was a member of the preparation committee and chairman of the poor relief board and member of the school holiday colony board. Was chairman of the pension committee in 1946 and former member of the board for Uddevalla labor society. Chairman of the Uddevalla teacher's club.
